text: Zai siwang jianglin nimen zhiqian, nimen dang shishe wo suo ciyu nimen de caifu, yimian ta [ren] dao shi [shenpan ri] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Jiaru ni yanhuan wo yidian er shijian [fanhui chenshi], name, wo yiding shishe wo de caifu [zhu][ru jiao tian ke], yiding chengwei xingshan zhe zhi yi [ru wancheng chaojin gongke deng].”
